EmailTemplate.name: NavDB Web Access No Service
EmailTemplate.subject: Honeywell NavDB Request - Missing Information {!Case.Case_Number__c} {!Case.Case_Ref_ID__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for contacting the Honeywell Data Services Team. We've received your request for Navigational Database (NavDB) web access.
Unfortunately, we’re unable to complete your request at this time. The information you've provided does not match any of our active database subscriptions.
If you're interested in our NavDB subscription services and would like us to contact you, please let us know.
Questions?
We’ll connect all of your request details through the subject line of this email. So, should you reply, please leave the subject line unchanged to make sure your response is routed immediately to this case.
Thanks again! We appreciate your business.
{!Case.OwnerFirstName} Data Services Account Management Representative email: DSA@Honeywell.com
phone: 602-436-6739
For 24/7 Technical Support email: AeroTechSupport@Honeywell.com phone: 855-808-6500 (US/Canada), 1-602-365-3343 (International)
